sources.title: The Gentleman from California (1937) RICHARDO CORTEZüçï COWBOY WESTERN
sources.description:
Stars: Ricardo Cortez, Marjorie Weaver, Katherine DeMille
Director: Gus Meins

Step into the dusty streets of 1855 California in this swashbuckling Classic Western adventure starring Ricardo Cortez, Marjorie Weaver, and Katherine DeMille. Directed by Gus Meins, this vintage gem blends Old West action with political intrigue and heroic rebellion in the style of Robin Hood.

When a native Californian returns home after years of education in Spain, he finds his homeland overrun by greedy politicians and corrupt officials. The land of his ancestors is under siege, and the proud heritage of old California families is being stolen piece by piece. Refusing to stand by, he takes up arms‚Äînot as an outlaw, but as a masked defender of justice.

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

Fans of Cowboy Westerns, Ricardo Cortez Western roles, and historical tales of frontier resistance will find plenty to enjoy in this rare treasure from the golden age of Hollywood. With memorable performances by Marjorie Weaver and Katherine DeMille, and stylish direction from Gus Meins, this story of courage, honor, and rebellion is brought to you by PizzaFLIX.
